abstract: Hampton Bays, LI, couple files suit against Roman Catholic Diocese of Rockville Centre and Catholic order of priest Augusto Cortez, alleging Cortez molested their daughter and accusing church of negligence in failing to supervise Cortez, who had previously pleaded guilty to child molestation; Cortez has disappeared and is considered fugitive.
lead_paragraph: The family last year accused a priest, who had pleaded guilty to a sex crime in 2009, of molesting one of their daughters, now 8.

headline.main: Long Island Family Sues Catholic Order and Diocese in Molestation Case
headline.print_headline: Family Accuses Catholic Diocese and Order of Negligence in Molestation Case

snippet: The family last year accused a priest, who had pleaded guilty to a sex crime in 2009, of molesting one of their daughters, now 8.
